entry.title: $1850 // $1850 1 bedroom available 3/1, Upper East Side/Yorkville
entry.content:
I'm relocating, and am looking to transfer my lease over for the remaining eight months (ends Oct 31) with an opportunity to renew. Apartment is located in the glorious neighborhood of Yorkville on the Upper East Side. Monthly rent is $1850. The past two re-signings, the rent only increased by $25.

1 bed/1 bath. It is on the fifth floor of a five story walk up. No doorman, no laundry in building, no dishwasher, but the space itself is really wonderful. Good neighbors, great location for someone who wants a little peace and quiet in their area, while still having access to local bars/restaurants/shops. The Q is two avenue's over, or a 5-10 minute walking, depending on how late you're running. Really wish I didn't need to move, because I could stay here forever.

Requires credit check and security + first & last month's rent. Landlord usually goes through a broker to rent these units, so a great opportunity to rent without a fee of 15% of the annual rent, about $3,000 that I'll never see again.

Here are pics:
https://imgur.com/a/1eOMF9s
